Package org.smartfrog.sfcore.languages.sf.sfcomponentdescription

Interface Summary
ComponentResolver Specifies the resolution interface to be implemented by all attributes (including component attributes, that need resolution at compile time and pre-deployment time.
SFComponentDescription Defines the context interface used by Components.
 

Class Summary
ResolutionState Encapsulates the state that is maintained during type, place, and deployment resolution.
SFComponentDescriptionImpl Defines the context class used by Components.
UnresolvedValue Stores an unresolved value and the source of the unresolved value.
